name: Happy 2021!
description:
I had some test assets, so using GB Studio I created a tiny "maze" within about an hour or so on New Year's Eve to celebrate the end of 2020. This was a test to see if I could build a little something before the year was over, and now I'm releasing it as a freebie to anybody that might like a little chuckle or warm vibes.

Enjoy!

(And don't forget to follow @GBStudioDev and @maltby, they've made a great dev tool!)
